heroData.subTitle: We create prototypes to validate the problem and the solution to the market you're trying to serve, develop scalable software to create value for your users, and create additional growth opportunities through continuous iteration.
heroData.name: Launching a new product

sectionData.caption: Validate your product
sectionData.title: Strategies to help your product move to digital

data.title: Product Strategy
data.content: Give your product a vision to help your customers succeed and position yourself in the market.

data.title: Risk Assessment
data.content: Become aware of risk factors for your product and safeguard your business from failure.

data.title: Market Validation
data.content: Gather evidence to solve the right problem for the right people.

data.title: Prioritized Roadmap
data.content: Tackle your most valuable opportunities first to create more value and growth.

sectionData.caption: We help you do it right
sectionData.title: Development to bring your product to market

data.title: Development Sprints
data.content: Increase collaboration through a short feedback loop and frequent demos.

data.title: User Story Mapping
data.content: More effective planning through an actionable product roadmap.

data.title: Automated Testing
data.content: Increase confidence and ship features faster.

data.title: Performance Testing
data.content: Create a scalable product that grows with your business.

data.title: Design Thinking
data.content: Improve your business by approaching problems in new ways and help your customers more effectively.

data.title: Motion
data.content: Improve engagement with interactive and intuitive user experiences.

data.q: How much time would my project take to complete?
data.a: An accurate estimation on the project length cannot be done until we have put together the project requirements, but a fairly general estimation would be 2-4 weeks for an SSG website.
Our billing cycle is synced with our 2 week sprint cycle, so you know exactly how your investment was allocated.

data.q: What do we take in consideration when it comes to billing?
data.a: We bill based on the number of people that were active on the project during the previous sprint, and the actual number of hours invested up to 70h per member per sprint.
